goal.en: To understand the basic theory of engineering mechanics
goal.ch: 讓同學了解應用力學之相關知識，對未來之力學課程有初步之基礎。

content.en:
1.Basic theory
2.Force and vector
3.Equilibrium
4.Force analysis
5.Equilibrium of rigid body
6.Structural analysis
7.Internal force Analysis
8.Friction force
9.Centroid, center of gravity, and second moment
10.Virtual work
content.ch:
1.基本定理
2.力與向量
3.質點平衡
4.合力分析
5.剛體平衡
6.結構分析
7.內力分析
8.摩擦力
9.質心重心與二次矩
10.虛功原理

textbook.en: 1.Vector Mechanics for Engineers - Statics, Ferdinand .P Beer, 12th Ed. in SI unit, McGraw-Hill. 2.Engineering Mechanics - Statics, Russell C. Hibbeler, 14th Ed. in SI unit, Pearson.“
textbook.ch: 1.Vector Mechanics for Engineers - Statics, Ferdinand .P Beer, 12th Ed. in SI unit, McGraw-Hill. 2.Engineering Mechanics - Statics, Russell C. Hibbeler, 14th Ed. in SI unit, Pearson.“
